title: Why must i always get these teams every time. WHY!
body: Just WHY though. Every ranked game, not even just limited to ranked games. I know everyone has had enough of these post about "oh i cant get out of bronze because of my team" but I'm not saying that it's all their fault in games, i mess up a lot as well but i mean, in the games where i actually go good in these people ruin the games. Not to mention that even in the game i go bad in, i have never gotten carried by these trash teams, the only ranked games which i win, i carry hard.

replies.body:
Could be worse. My entire team was fed, and our opponents were like 1/10, WE WERE LITERALLY AT THE NEXUS WITH ALL ENEMIES DEAD and then for no reason whatsoever, my teammates just suicided, the enemy took baron, and we lost... RIP 17LP

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Not feeding to going good imo. Bot lane feeds, the world turns.

>actually go good

5/3/1 isn't going good kek
